Pre-Game Insights: Dallas Mavericks and Chicago Bulls will face off in a non-conference matchup on November 7, 2024.
Dallas Mavericks had a 50-32 overall record and a 25-16 home record during the 2023-24 season.
Chicago Bulls had a 39-43 overall record and a 19-22 road record during the 2023-24 season.
Dallas Mavericks shot 48.1% from the field and 36.9% from 3-point range last season.
Chicago Bulls averaged 7.8 steals, 4.8 blocks, and 11.7 turnovers per game last season.
Injuries for the Mavericks include Dante Exum (out with wrist injury) and Maxi Kleber (day to day with hamstring injury).
Injuries for the Bulls include Zach LaVine (day to day with hip injury) and Lonzo Ball (out with wrist injury).
